alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Prowers County Including Lamar; San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 4:09AM MDT until April 13 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect from noon to 7 PM MDT today for strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 224 and 226 through 237, which includes the San Luis Valley and all of the southeast plains... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Thursday morning through Thursday evening for strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 227...228...229...230...231...232...233 and 234 which includes Southern El Paso, Pueblo, Huerfano, Crowley, Bent, Kiowa and the lower elevations of Las Animas counties.... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 224...226...235...236 AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 224...226...235...236 and 237. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Prowers County Including Lamar; San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache
